title: Skydance-Paramount deal closes; Reuters notes editorial 'ombudsman' undertakings
summary: Skydanceâ€™s acquisition of Paramount Global closed. Reuters reported the companies agreed to public-interest undertakings including newsroom ombuds positions and pledges on unbiased journalism.
notes: While Reuters reported FCC-related undertakings tied to broadcast license transfers, final conditions are still being parsed across agencies; cite Reuters for contemporaneous reporting.
